title: Assad Says He Wants No Part Of U.S. Campaign Against ISIS
teaser: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad granted a rare interview to the BBC. In it, he said the Syrian government has given the U.S. intelligence on airstrikes against the militants of the Islamic State, but he said there is no tactical cooperation with Washington, D.C.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
